resources.string: Hold on as long as you can in this game!
You are now in the Caatinga. Collect the badges to score, but be careful when touching people and monsters. If you touch them you will lose the game!
This forest is mainly made up of cacti.
This forest is mainly made of Jurubebas (a Brazilian plant).
This forest is made up of vegetation from the exclusively Brazilian Caatinga biome.
This forest is made up of vegetation from the exclusively Brazilian Caatinga biome.
The diamond gives you 1 point and also extra energy.
The diamond gives you 2 point and also extra energy.
The diamond gives you 3 point and also extra energy.
The diamond gives you 4 point and also extra energy.
The diamond gives you 5 point and also extra energy.
The diamond gives you 7 point and also extra energy.
Click on the roulette wheel to find out who will help me destroy you in the game!
Click on the roulette wheel to start the GAME!
Click the button below to keep the sound on or off next time
